name: XCTMetric
desc: A protocol that defines the methods that objects must provide when gathering metrics during performance tests.

items.name: func willBeginMeasuring()
items.desc: A method that XCTest calls when it's ready to begin running the measured code.

items.name: func didStopMeasuring()
items.desc: A method that XCTest calls when it has finished running the measured code.

items.name: func reportMeasurements(from: XCTPerformanceMeasurementTimestamp, to: XCTPerformanceMeasurementTimestamp) -> [XCTPerformanceMeasurement]
items.desc: Reports the measurements gathered for a metric between specific timestamps.
